title: electronic_descriptors
description: Electronic descriptors for the optimized molecular geometry

scf_dipole_moment.description: The X, Y, and Z dipole components of electric dipole moment. Units: Debye

scf_total_energy.description: Highest occupied molecular orbital. Units: eV

homo.description: Highest occupied molecular orbital. Units: eV

lumo.description: Lowest unoccupied molecular orbital. Units: eV
